ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank to laboratory of Professor Esteban Domingo (Centro de Biología Molecular Severo Ochoa, Madrid) for providing plasmids pET-28a3Dpol, pET-28aD338A, Jc1FLAG2(p7-nsGluc2a) and Jc1FLAG2(p7-nsGluc2a)/GNN, and Professor Luis Blanco (Centro de Biología Molecular Severo Ochoa, Madrid) for allowing the use of his laboratory to perform the polymerization experiments in the presence of radiolabeled nucleotides. This work was supported by grants RYC-2015-17280 and BIO2017-85124-R from Ministerio de Economía, Industria y Competitividad. Y S-A. is the recipient of an FPI-predoctoral fellowship from Universidad CEU San Pablo. AA is the recipient of a Research project-1 grant from Independent Research Fund Denmark (Technology and Production Sciences, DFF-FTP), application number 6111-00104B.
